properties.entry: SELECT E.EMP_NAME, D.DEPT_TITLE, J.JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE WHERE E.EMP_ID = ?
